newsitem.title: UK: Telkom at $30.925 in London at 0802 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Telkom at $30.925 in London at 0802 GMT.

text.p: PT Telkom traded at $30.925 and London at 0802 GMT on Monday. It recorded the day's low of $30.725 and the day's high of $31.05.
Its previous close on Friday $31.17. One ADS represents 20 ordinary shares -- Jakarta newsroom (Tel: 6221-3846364).
